A CRM You’ll Actually Use

Contact management and automation to simplify your life.

Schedule a Demo

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off||” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CRM Headline” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Organize Your Data and Manage Your Day With an Intuitive Dashboard

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/devicesCRM.jpg” alt=”Market Leader CRM on tablet and smartphone” title_text=”Market Leader CRM on tablet and smartphone” align=”right” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”CRM Image” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” animation=”off” sticky=”off”]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CRM Text” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Working your contacts has never been easier:

  • Respond quickly with automated text and email alerts
  • Know when your contacts have been on your website and which properties they’ve viewed or saved
  • Send relevant listings at your desired frequency with automated listing alerts
  • Work your contacts using advanced filters and target the right people with groups
  • Leverage lead conversion action plans to stay on-track

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off||” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#ffffff” background_image=”/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/homepageBackground.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” custom_padding=”|180px||180px” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Seamless Integration” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Streamline Your Business With Seamless Integration

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Website” image=”/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/webinarIcon.png” alt=”Success coaching and training including the million dollar pipeline program” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”50px” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Contact and housing search information flows from the website to the CRM.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Marketing” image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/MCicon.png” alt=”Marketing Center Icon” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”50px” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Fully integrated with a complete marketing center to easily automate your marketing.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”MLS” image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/MLSicon.png” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”50px” hover_enabled=”0″ use_border_color=”off” alt=”For sale sign icon” title_text=”For sale sign icon” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Connect with your MLS(s) to send listings and include listing details in marketing pieces.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lead Sources” image=”http://www.marketleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/leadsIcon.png” alt=”Real estate lead generation systems icon” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”50px” use_border_color=”off”]

Integrates with 40+ lead sources including Zillow, Trulia, and Realtor.com.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”3px|0px|50px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|” admin_label=”Mobile App” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”50px|||”]
